common_questions: So what is your current compensation?

tell me about a time you improved a process", smashed all these
explain my entire 5 year career plan on a whiteboard
explain yourself clearly or have the chance to elaborate on relevant skills for the rol

interview_tips: in the comments, I will add it to my notes, and thank you for the encouragement
it is readable and I am a very helpful person when asked for help, I think people can attest to that
and encouragement has completely snapped me out of my pity party today
on the interview process - don't sound so rehearsed when you are doing the STAR thing
ways you could potentially improve what they are doing currently
this is happening‚Äù and these are things that are just simply not my fault
you put a little more pep into your voice
talking to your own manager about your concerns and the unnecessary damage to morale you're seeing

on negotiating? I currently don't have any offers
red_flags: with you, and why no one deems you good enough to interview, let alone be contacted for an initial screening call
forget- to pass on the generosity to others as you yourself have received
jerk over co-workers on your way out
want you to think I'm writing **unreadable super intelligent code,** I very much make sure it is readable and I am a very helpful person when asked fo
try to do it quickly, it'll make them look bad and make you look like a smart ass
punish laziness and don't reward hard work, why work so hard?
reward hard work if there's no promotions to be had
owe the company anything and vice versa, and to bust your ass for a company that likely doesn't *really* give a fuck about you is just dumb

process_insights.format: Mix of phone screen, technical, behavioral, on-site, virtual
